Translations.Text: when Zachariah implored jeho Lord Moj Lord grant mna such dobry dieta Ona bol Hearer prayers
angels vola sa him when he praying sanctuary GOD dat ona dobry zvest z Ahoj believer word GOD honorable moral righteous prophet
He said Ako mozem ja have chlapec when ja bol stara moj manzelka sterile He said GOD robit whatever He wills
He said Moj Lord dat mna znamenie. He said Tvoj znamenie bol lenze ona nie speak do ludia 3 dni znamenie! Commemorate tvoj Lord frequently; meditate night dni
angels said O Mary GOD zvolit si ona purified ona. He zvolit si ona all zensky
O Mary ona submit tvoj Lord prostrate bow nadol those bow nadol
This bol zvest minuly my reveal ona. Ona nie bol there when they kreslit ich raffles select Mary's guardian Ona nie bol present when they argued 1 iny
angels said O Mary GOD dat ona dobry zvest Word z Him vola sa je Messiah Jesus syn Mary. He bol prominent v this zivot Hereafter 1 z those koniec do Mna
